title: Field emission in liquid helium.
abstract: Currents of electrons or positive ions as large as several x 10^-7 A have been injected into liquid helium by means of field emission or ionisation near a metal tip at potential up to 2500 V. The electron emission showed a pronounced maximum near T = 1.7 K
